body: The Marshal ensures that the kingdom's laws are being enforced in the remote parts of the kingdom as well as in the vicinity of the capital. The Marshal is also responsible for securing the kingdom's borders. He organizes regular patrols and works with the General to respond to threats that militias and adventurers can't deal with alone.
name: Marshal
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Kingdoms And War/Kingdom Building/Leadership Roles/Marshal

sections.body: Add your Dexterity modifier or Wisdom modifier to Economy.
sections.name: Benefit
